# vpp

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807609-vpp#see-also)

### [Fields](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807609-vpp#fields)

[`If`](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807590-if)VNOP_SYMLINK() is successful, the new file should be returned with an iocount which will be dropped by the caller. VFS does not ensure that the target path will have a length shorter than the max symlink length for the filesystem.[`dvp`](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807603-dvp)Parent directory for new symlink file.[`cnp`](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807615-cnp)Name information for new symlink.[`vap`](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807617-vap)Attributes for symlink.[`target`](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807620-target)Path for symlink to store; for "ln -s /var/vardir linktovardir", "target" would be "/var/vardir"[`ctx`](/documentation/kernel/vnop_readdir_args/1807622-ctx)Context to authenticate for symlink request.
